article.title: Britney_Spears

template.arg: Spears at the [[KIIS-FM|102.7 KIIS FM]] [[Wango Tango]] concert in [[Carson, California]], May 2013

article.paragraph: Britney Jean Spears(born December 2, 1981) is an American singer and actress. Born inMcComb, Mississippi, and raised inKentwood, Louisiana, she performed acting roles in stage productions and television shows as a child before signing withJive Recordsin 1997. Spears's first and second studio albums,...Baby One More Time (album)...Baby One More Time(1999) andOops!... I Did It Again (album)Oops!... I Did It Again(2000), became international successes, with the former becoming the best-selling album by a teenage solo artist.Folkard, Claire (2003).Guinness World Records 2003. Bantam Books. p. 288. ISBN 978-0-553-58636-7.Title tracks "...Baby One More Time (song)...Baby One More Time" and "Oops!... I Did It Again (song)Oops!... I Did It Again" broke international sales records. In 2001, Spears released her self-titled third studio album,Britney (album)Britney, and played the starring role in the filmCrossroads (2002 film)Crossroads(2002). She assumed creative control of her fourth studio album,In the Zone(2003), which yielded the worldwide success of the "Toxic (song)Toxic" single.

In 2007, Spears's much-publicized personal issues sent her career into hiatus. Her fifth studio album,Blackout (Britney Spears album)Blackout, was released later that year, and spawned hits such as "Gimme More" and "Piece of Me". Her erratic behavior and hospitalizations continued through the following year, at which point she was placed under a still ongoingconservatorship. Spears's sixth studio album,Circus (Britney Spears album)Circus(2008), included global chart-topping lead single "Womanizer (song)Womanizer". Its supporting tourThe Circus Starring Britney Spearswas one of the highest-grossing global concert tours in 2009.cite webhttp://www.stereotude.com/madonna/15-most-profitable-female-tours-ever.html15 Most Profitable Female Tours EverMay 21, 2010July 27, 2010EsmailianAniHollyscoopDNA GroupLater that October, "3 (Britney Spears song)3" became Spears's third single to reach number one on theBillboardHot 100. Her seventh studio album,Femme Fatale (Britney Spears album)Femme Fatale(2011), became her first to yield three top-ten singles in the United States: "Hold It Against Me", "Till the World Ends" and "I Wanna Go". She also served as a judge during theThe X Factor (U.S. season 2)second seasonof theThe X Factor (U.S. TV series)American versionofThe X Factor. Spears's eponymous eighth studio albumBritney Jeanwas released in 2013; it spawned the top 15 hit "Work Bitch"; however, it became the lowest-selling record of her career. Later that year, Spears began the four-yearresidency showBritney: Piece of MeatThe AXISatPlanet Hollywood Resort & Casinoin Las Vegas.

Spears was established as apop iconand credited with influencing the revival ofteen popduring the late 1990s. She became the 'best-selling teenaged artist of all time'Ruggieri, Melissa (December 19, 2000). "Music Notes".Richmond Times-Dispatch: pp. D.13and garnered honorific titles including the "Honorific nicknames in popular musicPrincess of Pop".Often referred to in interviews, cover stories and promotional material as the new 'princess of pop' Susan Hopkins (2002),Girl Heroes: The New Force In Popular Culture, University of Michigan Press, p. 60Her work has earned herList of awards and nominations received by Britney Spearsnumerous awardsand accolades, including aGrammy AwardsGrammy Award, sixMTV Video Music Awardsincluding theMichael Jackson Video Vanguard AwardLifetime Achievement Award, nineBillboard Music Award''Billboard'' Music Awards, and a star on theHollywood Walk of Fame. In 2009,Billboardranked her as the 8th overall Artist of the Decade,and also recognized her as the best-selling female artist of the 2000s, as well as the fifth overall.TheRIAA certificationRecording Industry Association of America(RIAA) named Spears as the eighthList of best-selling music artists in the United Statestop-selling female artistin the United States, with 34 millionRIAA certificationcertifiedalbums.cite webhttp://www.riaa.com/goldandplatinumdata.php?tableRIAA — Gold & Platinum — May 3, 20102010May 3, 2010[[Recording Industry Association of America]][[Mitch Bainwol]]She has sold over 100 million albums worldwide and over 100 million singlescite newshttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/480544/la-reid-courts-britney-spears-for-record-deal/L.A. Reid Courts Britney Spears for Record DealShirleyHalperin[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]August 8, 2012July 30, 2014making her one of theList of best-selling music artistsbest-selling music artistsof all time. According to Billboard Spears has sold about 22,38 million singles in digital downloads in US and is the Fourth best selling female artist since Nielsen Souncand began.http://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/chart-beat/6509510/ask-billboard-britney-spearss-career-sales?mobile_redirection=falseRolling Stonerecognized her instant success as one of the Top 25 Teen Idol Breakout Moments of all time,cite webhttp://www.rollingstone.com/music/lists/the-top-25-teen-idol-breakout-moments-20120511/britney-spears-2000-20120511The Top 25 Teen Idol Breakout Moments – Britney SpearsMay 15, 2012Rolling StonewhileVH1ranked her eleventh on their "100 Greatest Women in Music" list in 2012,cite webGrahamMarkhttp://www.vh1.com/music/tuner/2012-02-13/vh1s-100-greatest-women-in-music-complete-list/VH1's 100 Greatest Women In Music (Complete List)VH1February 13, 2012http://www.webcitation.org/65vGgxvIIMarch 5, 2012andBillboardnamed her the sexiest woman in music.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/485392/musics-sexiest-man-woman-poll-resultsMusic's Sexiest Man & Woman: Poll ResultsJune 12, 2012June 12, 2012BillboardForbesreported that Spears was the highest paid female musician of 2012, with earnings of $58 million, having last topped the list in 2002.cite webhttp://www.ibtimes.com/britney-spears-highest-paid-woman-music-2012-full-list-935061Britney Spears Is The Highest-Paid Woman In Music For 2012; Full ListInternational Business TimesJanuary 4, 2013
article.heading: Life and career
198197: Early life and career beginnings
article.paragraph: Spears was born inMcComb, Mississippi, the second child ofLynne SpearsLynne Irene Bridgesand James Parnell Spears. Her maternal grandmother, Lillian Portell, wasEnglish peopleEnglish(born inLondon), and one of Spears's maternal great-great-grandfathers wasMaltese peopleMaltese.cite newshttp://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-1056674/EXCLUSIVE-First-photos-Britney-Spears-newly-discovered-British-family.htmlExclusive: First photos of Britney Spears' newly-discovered British familyDaily MailUKSeptember 17, 2008June 4, 2010ThomasLizcite bookSpearsLynneSeptember 16, 2008Chapter 2: Kentwood – From Malta to LouisianaThrough the Storm: A Real Story of Fame and Family in a Tabloid Worldhttp://books.google.com/books?id1stNashville, Tennessee[[Thomas Nelson (publisher)|Thomas Nelson, Inc.]]49781418567354February 19, 2014But on my mama's side, the family tree is a little more colorful and glamorous. Her father, my grandfather, was Anthony Portelli, who came from the island of Malta.harvnbSpearsCraker20084Her siblings areBryan SpearsBryan JamesandJamie Lynn SpearsJamie Lynn.harvnbSpearsCraker2008211At age three, she started attending dance lessons in her hometown ofKentwood, Louisiana, and was selected to perform as a solo artist at the annual recital. During her childhood, she also attended gymnastics and voice lessons, and won many state-level competitions and children's talent shows.harvnbSpearsCraker200856cite journalCover Story: Britney Spears: Britney Spears : Rolling StoneApril 15, 1999Rolling StoneDalySteven0035-791Xharvcite newshttp://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,195283,00.htmlBritney Spears' BiographyFox News ChannelJuly 31, 2008June 6, 2010ReporterStaffSpears made her local stage debut at age five, singing "What Child Is This?" at herkindergartengraduation. She said about her ambition as a child, "I was in my own world, [...] I found out what I'm supposed to do at an early age".At age eight, Spears and her mother Lynne traveled toAtlanta,Georgia (U.S. state)Georgiafor an audition in the 1990s revival ofThe Mickey Mouse Club. Casting director Matt Casella rejected her for being too young to join the series at the time, but introduced her to Nancy Carson, a New York City talent agent. Carson was impressed with Spears's vocals and suggested enrolling her at theProfessional Performing Arts School; shortly after, Lynne and her daughters moved to a sublet apartment in New York. Spears was hired for her first professional role as the understudy for the lead role of Tina Denmark in the Off-Broadway musicalRuthless!. She also appeared as a contestant on the popular television showStar Searchand was cast in a number of commercials.harvnbSpearsCraker200875harvnbLaufenberg2005616In December 1992, she was finally cast inThe Mickey Mouse Club, but returned to Kentwood after the show was canceled in 1995. She enrolled atParklane Academyin McComb, Mississippi. Although she made friends with most of her classmates, she compared the school to "the opening scene inClueless (film)Cluelesswith all thecliques. [...] I was so bored. I was the point guard on the basketball team. I had my boyfriend, and I went to homecoming and Christmas formal. But I wanted more."cite journalCover Story: The Girl Can't Help ItMay 25, 2000Rolling StoneMundyChris0035-791Xharv

In June 1997, Spears was in talks with managerLou Pearlmanto join the female pop groupInnosense. Lynne asked family friend and entertainment lawyerLarry Rudolphfor his opinion and submitted a tape of Spears singing over aWhitney Houstonkaraoke song along with some pictures. Rudolph decided he wanted to pitch her to record labels, therefore she needed a professional demo. He sent Spears an unused song ofToni Braxton; she rehearsed for a week and recorded her vocals in a studio with aAudio engineersound engineer. Spears traveled to New York with the demo and met with executives from four labels, returning to Kentwood the same day. Three of the labels rejected her, arguing that audiences wanted pop bands such as theBackstreet Boysand theSpice Girls, and "there wasn't going to be anotherMadonna (entertainer)Madonna, anotherDebbie Gibson, or anotherTiffany (American singer)Tiffany." Two weeks later, executives fromJive Recordsreturned calls to Rudolph.Senior vice president ofArtists and repertoireA&RJeff Fenster stated about Spears's audition that "it's very rare to hear someone that age who can deliver emotional content and commercial appeal. [...] For any artist, the motivationthe 'eye of the tiger'is extremely important. And Britney had that."She then sang Houston's "I Have Nothing" (1992) for the executives, and got signed to the label.cite journalTaylor, Chuckhttp://books.google.com/?idBillboardAir Waves: Jive's Britney Spears Sets Top 40 Abuzz With Rhythm-Leaning 'Baby One More Time'11043October 24, 1998March 11, 20110006-2510harvThey appointed her to work with producer Eric Foster White for a month, who reportedly shaped her voice from "lower and less poppy" delivery to "distinctively, unmistakably Britney."harvnbHughes2005147After hearing the recorded material, presidentClive Calderordered a full album. Spears had originally envisioned "Sheryl Crowmusic, but younger more adult contemporary" but felt all right with her label's appointment of producers, since "It made more sense to go pop, because I can dance to itit's more me." She flew toCheiron Studiosin Stockholm, Sweden, where half of the album was recorded from March to April 1998, with producersMax Martin,Denniz PopandRami Yacoub, among others.
article.heading: 19982000:...Baby One More TimeandOops!... I Did It Again
article.paragraph: After Spears returned to the United States, she embarked on a shopping mall promotional tour to promote her debut album. Her show was a four song set and she was accompanied by two back up dancers. Her first concert tour followed, as an opening act forNSYNC.harvnbBlandford200228Her debut studio album,...Baby One More Time (album)...Baby One More Time, was released on January 12, 1999.cite webhttp://www.rollingstone.com/music/news/britney-spears-teen-queen-rolling-stones-1999-cover-story-20110329Britney Spears, Teen Queen: Rolling Stone's 1999 Cover StoryRolling Stone2011January 22, 2010It debuted at number one on the U.S.Billboard 200''Billboard'' 200and was certified two-timesMusic recording sales certificationplatinumby theRecording Industry Association of Americaafter a month. Worldwide, the album topped the charts in fifteen countries and sold over 10 million copies in a year.harvnbBlandford200230It became the biggest selling album ever by a teenage artist.The...Baby One More Time (song)title trackwas released as thelead singlefrom the album. Originally, Jive Records wanted its music video to be animated; however, Spears rejected it, and suggested the final idea of a Catholic schoolgirl.The single sold 500,000 copies on its first day, and peaked at number one on theBillboard Hot 100''Billboard'' Hot 100, topping the chart for two consecutive weeks. It has sold more than 10 million as of today, making it one of theList of best-selling singlesbest-selling singlesof all time.harvnbBlandford200229harvnbBronson2003377"...Baby One More Time" later received aGrammynomination forGrammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal PerformanceBest Female Pop Vocal Performance.cite webhttp://www.rockonthenet.com/archive/2000/grammys.htmRock On The Net: 42nd Annual Grammy Awards – 2000[[National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences]]RockOntheNet.com2010June 5, 2010The title track also topped the singles chart for two weeks in the United Kingdom, and became the fastest-selling single ever by a female artist, shipping over 460,000 copies.cite webhttp://everyhit.com/record4.htmlRecord-Breakers and TriviaEveryhit.com2010June 5, 2010It would later become theUK Million-Selling Singles25th most successful song of all time in British chart history.cite webhttp://everyhit.com/bestsellingsingles.htmlBest Selling Singles Of All TimeEveryhit.com2010June 5, 2010Spears is also the youngest female artist to have a million seller in the country.cite webhttp://www.officialcharts.com/artist/_/BRITNEY%20SPEARS/Britney SpearsThe Official Charts Company2010June 5, 2010"(You Drive Me) Crazy" was released as the third single from the album. It became a top-ten hit worldwide and propelled...Baby One More Time (album)...Baby One More Timeto sell even more. As of today, it has sold 30 million copies worldwide, making it one of the best-selling albums of all time. It is also the best-selling first album by any artist ever.cite newshttp://www.guardian.co.uk/music/2008/nov/28/britney-spears-circusLondonThe GuardianBritney Spears: CircusNovember 27, 2008AlexisPetridis

The April 1999 cover ofRolling Stonefeatured Spears lying on her bed, covered with a bra, shorts and an open top. TheAmerican Family Association(AFA) referred to the shoot as "a disturbing mix of childhood innocence and adult sexuality" and called to "God-loving Americans to boycott stores selling Britney's albums." Spears responded to the outcry commenting, "What's the big deal? I have strong morals. [...] I'd do it again. I thought the pictures were fine. And I was tired of being compared to Debbie Gibson and all of thisbubblegum popall the time."harvnbBlandford200236Shortly before, Spears had announced publicly she would remain avirginuntil marriage.On June 28, 1999, Spears began her first headlining...Baby One More Time Tourin North America, which was positively received by critics,cite webhttp://jam.canoe.ca/Music/Artists/S/Spears_Britney/1999/07/10/749831.htmlSpears takes aim at fameJuly 10, 1999January 1, 2010StevensonJane[[Jam!]][[Quebecor Inc.]]but generated some controversy due to her racy outfits.harvnbBlandford200238An extension of the tour, titled Crazy 2k, followed in March 2000. Spears premiered songs from her upcoming second album during the show.

Oops!... I Did It Again (album)Oops!... I Did It Again, her second studio album, was released in May 2000. It debuted at number one in the US, selling 1.3 million copies, breaking theSoundScanrecord for the highest debut sales by any solo artist.cite journalOops!...She Sold 1.3 Million Albums: Britney SpearsMay 25, 2000Rolling StoneSkanseRichard0035-791XharvThe album sold over 25 million copies worldwide to date, making one of the best-selling albums of all time.cite webhttp://www.britneyspears.com/2010/05/oops-week-10-fun-facts.phpOops! Week: 10 Fun FactsMay 20, 2010June 5, 2010StaffMichaelBritneySpears.com Brandcasting Unlimited//web.archive.org/web/20100606172346/http://www.britneyspears.com/2010/05/oops-week-10-fun-facts.phpJune 6, 2010Rob SheffieldofRolling Stonesaid that "the great thing aboutOops!  under the cheese surface, Britney's demand for satisfaction is complex, fierce and downright scary, making her a true child ofrock & rolltradition."cite journalBritney Spears: Oops!...I Did It Again : Music Reviews : Rolling StoneJune 8, 2000Rolling StoneSheffieldRob0035-791XharvThe album's lead single, "Oops!... I Did It Again (song)Oops!... I Did It Again", peaked at the top of the charts in Australia, New Zealand, the United Kingdom and many other European nations.cite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/en/showitem.asp?interpretultratop.be — Britney Spears — Oops!... I Did It Again:[[Ultratop]]Hung MedienJune 5, 2010The album as well as the title track received Grammy nominations forGrammy Award for Best Pop Vocal AlbumBest Pop Vocal Albumand Best Female Pop Vocal Performance, respectively.cite webhttp://www.rockonthenet.com/archive/2001/grammys.htmRock On The Net: 43rd Annual Grammy Awards – 2001National Academy of Recording Arts and SciencesRockOntheNet.com2010June 6, 2010

The same year, Spears embarked on theOops!... I Did It Again Tour, which grossed $40.5 million; she also released her first book,Britney Spears productsBritney Spears' Heart-to-Heart, co-written with her mother.On September 7, 2000, Spears performed at the2000 MTV Video Music Awards. Halfway through the performance, she ripped off her black suit to reveal a sequined flesh-colored bodysuit, followed by heavy dance routine. It is noted by critics as the moment that Spears showed signs of becoming a more provocative performer.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1568995/20070906/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney Spears' Greatest VMA Hits: Barely There Costumes, Giant Snakes And A Scandalous Lip-LockSeptember 6, 2007June 5, 2010MontgomeryJamesMTVAmidst media speculation, Spears confirmed she was dating NSYNC memberJustin Timberlake.
article.heading: 200102:Britneyand acting debut
article.paragraph: File:Britney Spears.jpgthumbuprightrightSpears performing at the NFL Kickoff Live, September 2003In February 2001, Spears signed a $78 million promotional deal withPepsi, and released another book co-written with her mother, entitledA Mother's Gift.Her self-titled third studio album,Britney (album)Britney, was released in November 2001. While on tour, she felt inspired by hip hop artists such asJay-ZandThe Neptunesand wanted to create a record with a funkier sound.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1450334/20011024/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney Says Britney Reflects Who Britney IsOctober 25, 2001June 5, 2010MossCoreyMTVThe album debuted at number one in theBillboard200 and reached top five positions in Australia, the United Kingdom and mainland Europe and sold over 12 million copies worldwide.cite webhttp://www.store.livenation.com/Product.aspx?cp''Britney'' sold over 12 million copies worldwide2010June 12, 2010[[Live Nation]]cite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/en/showitem.asp?interpretultratop.be — Britney Spears — BritneyUltratopHung MedienJune 5, 2010Stephen Thomas ErlewineofAllMusiccalledBritney"the record where she strives to deepen her persona, making it more adult while still recognizably Britney. [...] It does sound like the work of a star who has now found and refined her voice, resulting in her best record yet."cite web{{Allmusic|classBritney – Overview2001June 5, 2010ErlewineStephen ThomasThe album was honored with two Grammy nominationsBest Pop Vocal Album and Best Female Pop Vocal Performance for "Overprotected" and was listed in 2008 as one ofEntertainment Weekly's "100 Best Albums from the Past 25 Years".cite webhttp://www.rockonthenet.com/archive/2003/grammys.htmRock On The Net: 45th Annual Grammy Awards – 2001National Academy of Recording Arts and SciencesRockOntheNet.com2010June 6, 2010cite newshttp://www.ew.com/ew/article/0,,20207076_20207387_20207337,00.htmlThe New Classics: MusicEntertainment Weekly2010June 6, 2010The album's first single, "I'm a Slave 4 U", became a top-ten hit worldwide.cite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/en/showitem.asp?interpretultratop.be — Britney Spears — I'm a Slave 4 UUltratopHung MedienJune 6, 2010

Spears's performance of the single at the2001 MTV Video Music Awardsfeatured a caged tiger and a largeBurmese pythonalbino pythondraped over her shoulders. It was harshly received by animal rights organizationPeople for the Ethical Treatment of AnimalsPETA, who claimed the animals were mistreated and scrapped plans for an anti-fur billboard that was to feature Spears.To support the album, Spears embarked on theDream Within a Dream Tour. The show was critically praised for its technical innovations, thepice de rsistancebeing a water screen that pumped two tons of water into the stage.cite webhttp://livedesignonline.com/mag/britneys_big_splash?smteBritney's Big SplashJuly 1, 2002June 6, 2010McHughCatherineLive Designcite webhttp://livedesignonline.com/mag/lighting_singin_rain/index.htmlSingin' in the RainAugust 1, 2002June 6, 2010SinglerlandAmy L.Live DesignThe tour grossed $43.7 million, becoming the second highest grossing tour of 2002 by a female artist, behindCher'sLiving Proof: The Farewell TourFarewell Tour.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/73086/mccartney-notches-years-highest-grossing-tourMcCartney Notches Year's Highest-Grossing Tour2002Billboard[[Nielsen Company]]January 26, 2010Her career success was highlighted byForbesin 2002, as Spears was ranked the world's most powerful celebrity.cite newshttp://www.forbes.com/lists/home.jhtml?passListIdForbes Celebrity 100 20022002June 6, 2010Forbes//web.archive.org/web/20101202174403/http://www.forbes.com/lists/home.jhtml?passListIdDecember 2, 2010Spears also landed her first starring role inCrossroads (2002 film)Crossroads, released in February 2002. Although the film was largely panned, some critics praised Spears's acting.cite webhttp://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/1112549-crossroads/Crossroads Movie Reviews, Pictures — Rotten Tomatoes2002June 6, 2010[[Rotten Tomatoes]][[Flixster]]cite webhttp://www.viewlondon.co.uk/films/crossroads-film-review-2625.htmlCrossroads Film Review — Crossroads Film Pictures, Crossroads Film TrailerApril 2, 2002June 6, 2010View London2 View Group Ltd.harvnbHughes2005152Crossroads, which had a $12 million budget, went on to gross over $61.1 million worldwide.

In June 2002, Spears opened her first restaurant, Nyla, inNew York City, but terminated her relationship in November, citing mismanagement and "management's failure to keep her fully apprised".cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1458900/20021126/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney Spears Bails On Her New York Restaurant, NylaNovember 27, 2002June 6, 2010MossCoreyMTVIn July 2002, Spears announced she would take a six-month break from her career; however, she went back into the studio in November to record her new album.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1458526/20021105/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney Spears' Hiatus Is HistoryNovember 5, 2002June 6, 2010MossCoreyMTVSpears's relationship with Justin Timberlake ended after three years. In December 2002, Timberlake released the song "Cry Me a River (Justin Timberlake song)Cry Me a River" as the second single from hisJustified (album)solo debut album. The music video featured a Spears look-alike and fueled the rumors that she had been unfaithful to him.cite webhttp://www.mb.com.ph/node/226195/thi'This one's for you': Ex-music couples sing of their love woesOctober 4, 2009June 6, 2010SanchezRowena Joy A.[[Manila Bulletin]]Manila Bulletin Publishing Corp.cite webhttp://sixtyminutes.ninemsn.com.au/stories/contributors/259121/britney-revealedBritney revealedNovember 23, 2003June 6, 2010SawyerDiane[[ninemsn]][[PBL Media]] / [[Microsoft]]As a response, Spears wrote the ballad "Everytime" with her backing vocalist and friendAnnet Artani.cite webhttp://www.muumuse.com/2010/02/annet-artani-from-everytime-to-alive.html#more-5249Annet Artani: From "Everytime" to "Alive"February 2010June 6, 2010SternBradleyMuuMuse.comThe same year,Limp BizkitfrontmanFred Durstsaid that he was in a relationship with Spears. However, Spears denied Durst's claims. In a 2009 interview, he explained that "I just guess at the time it was taboo for a guy like me to be associated with a gal like her."cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1607309/20090319/spears_britney.jhtmlFred Durst Looks Back At His Relationship With Britney SpearsMarch 19, 2009June 6, 2010JacksBrianMTV
article.heading: 200305:In the Zoneand marriages

link.part: Spears performing duringThe Onyx Hotel Touron April 2004

preblock.preline: In 2003 Spears opened the2003 MTV Video Music AwardswithChristina Aguilera, performing "Like a Virgin (song)Like a Virgin". Halfway through they were joined by Madonna, with whom they both kissed. The incident was highly publicized.Spears released her fourth studio album,In the Zone, in November 2003. She assumed more creative control by writing and co-producing most of the material.Vibe (magazine)Vibecalled it "A supremely confident dance record that also illustrates Spears's development as a songwriter."cite webhttp://www.metacritic.com/music/in-the-zone/britney-spearsIn The Zone reviews at Metacritic.com:2003June 6, 2010[[Metacritic]]NPRlisted the album as one of "The 50 Most Important Recording of the Decade", adding that "the decade's history of impeccably crafted pop is written on her body of work."cite webhttp://www.npr.org/2009/11/16/120400577/the-50-most-important-recordings-s-zThe 50 Most Important Recordings: S-Z : NPRNovember 16, 2009June 6, 2010NPR.comIn the Zonesold over 609,000 copies in the United States and debuted at the top of the charts, making Spears the first female artist in the SoundScan era to have her first four studio albums to debut at number one.It also debuted at the top of the charts in France and the top ten in Belgium, Denmark, Sweden and the Netherlands.cite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/en/showitem.asp?interpretultratop.be — Britney Spears — In the ZoneUltratopHung MedienJune 6, 2010In the Zonesold over 10 million copies worldwide.cite webhttp://www.store.livenation.com/Product.aspx?cp''In the Zone'' sold over 10 million copies worldwide2010June 12, 2010[[Live Nation]]The album produced the hit singles: "Me Against the Music", a collaboration with Madonna; "Toxic (song)Toxic"which won Spears her only Grammy forBest Dance Recording; "Everytime" and "Outrageous (song)Outrageous".

article.paragraph: In January 2004, Spears married childhood friend Jason Allen Alexander atThe Little White Wedding ChapelinLas Vegas,Nevada. The marriage wasannulmentannulled55 hours later, following a petition to the court that stated that Spears "lacked understanding of her actions".cite newshttp://www.today.com/id/3869708/Judge dissolves Britney's 'joke' wedding April 6, 2004June 10, 2010Associated Press[[NBCUniversal]] / [[Microsoft]]In March 2004, she embarked onThe Onyx Hotel Tourin support ofIn the Zone.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1485503/20040302/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney Checking Into Onyx Hotel Wearing Rubberlike OutfitMarch 2, 2004December 24, 2009VineyardJenniferMTVIn June 2004, Spears fell and injured her left knee during the music video shoot for "Outrageous (song)Outrageous". Spears underwentarthroscopic surgery. She was forced to remain six weeks with a thigh brace, followed by eight to twelve weeks of rehabilitation, which caused The Onyx Hotel Tour to be canceled.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,652994,00.htmlBritney Cancels Tour Due to Bad KneeJune 16, 2004December 27, 2009SilvermanStephen M.[[People (magazine)|People]]During 2004, Spears became involved in theKabbalah Centrethrough her friendship withMadonna (entertainer)Madonna.cite webhttp://www.today.com/id/12920032Forget Kabbalah, Britney's baby is her religion — Entertainment — msnbc.comJune 1, 2004June 10, 2010WallsJeannetteNBC Universal / Microsoft

In July 2004, Spears became engaged to American dancerKevin Federline, whom she had met three months before. The romance received intense attention from the media, since Federline had recently broken up with actressShar Jackson, who was still pregnant with their second child at the time.The stages of their relationship were chronicled in Spears's first reality showBritney & Kevin: Chaotic. They held a wedding ceremony on September 18, 2004, but were not legally married until three weeks later on October 6 due to a delay finalizing the couple's prenuptial agreement.harvnbHeller200780citation not foundShortly after, she released her first fragrance withElizabeth Arden,Curious (fragrance)Curious, which broke the company's first-week gross for a perfume.In October 2004, Spears took a career break to start a family.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1492692/20041016/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney Spears Announces She's Taking A Break From Her CareerOctober 16, 2004June 10, 2010VineyardJenniferMTVGreatest Hits: My Prerogative, her first greatest hitscompilation album, was released in November 2004.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1490190/20040813/spears_britney.jhtml?headlinesBritney Covers Bobby Brown's 'My Prerogative' For Forthcoming LPAugust 13, 2004October 6, 2010VineyardJenniferMTVSpears'scover versionofBobby Brown's "My Prerogative" was released as the lead single from the album, reaching the top of the charts in Finland, Ireland, Italy and Norway.cite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/fr/showitem.asp?interpretBritney Spears — My Prerogative (song)2004UltratopHung MedienOctober 6, 2010The second single, "Do Somethin'", was a top ten hit in Australia, the United Kingdom and other countries of mainland Europe.cite webhttp://acharts.us/uk_singles_top_75/2005/10UK Singles ChartMarch 7, 2005October 6, 2010[[Official Charts Company]]. aChartscite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/en/showitem.asp?interpretBritney Spears – Do Somethin' (song)2005October 6, 2010UltratopHung MedienThe greatest hits album sold over 5 million copies worldwide.cite webhttp://www.britney.com/mx/career-highlightsBiography – Sales2010June 5, 2010Britney.com. Sony Music Entertainment//web.archive.org/web/20101224220054/http://www.britney.com/mx/career-highlightsDecember 24, 2010In September 2005, Spears gave birth to her first child, a son.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,1039012_1107631,00.htmlBritney Welcomes Home Sean PrestonSeptember 21, 2005October 6, 2010PeopleIn November 2005, she released her first remix compilation,B in the Mix: The Remixes, which consists of eleven remixes.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1512630/20051031/spears_britney.jhtmlSurprise: Britney's Releasing An Album In Just Two WeeksVineyardJenniferMTVNovember 8, 2005October 6, 2010It has sold over 1 million copies worldwide.cite webhttp://www.dentonrc.com/sharedcontent/dws/ent/stories/DN-britneyalbums_1103gl.ART.State.Edition1.4209e2e.htmlBritney Spears' recordings find art imitating lifeDanielMikeNovember 6, 2007September 10, 2011[[Denton Record-Chronicle]][[A. H. Belo]]http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?qJanuary 13, 2012
article.heading: 200607: Personal struggles andBlackout
article.paragraph: In February 2006, pictures surfaced of Spears driving with her son Sean, on her lap instead of in a car seat. Child advocates were horrified by the photos of her holding the wheel with one hand and Sean with the other. Spears claimed that the situation happened because of a frightening encounter with paparazzi, and that it was a mistake on her part.The following month, sheGuest appearanceguest-starredon theWill & Graceepisode "Buy, Buy Baby" as closeted lesbian Amber Louise.cite newshttp://usatoday30.usatoday.com/life/people/2006-03-29-britney-sidebar_x.htmUSATODAY.com — Britney maybe one more timeThomasKarenUSA TodayMarch 29, 2006October 6, 2010She announced she no longer studied Kabbalah in June 2006, explaining, "my baby is my religion."Two months later, Spears posed nude for the cover ofHarper's Bazaar. The picture was heavily compared toDemi Moore'sMore Demi MooreAugust 1991 ''Vanity Fair'' cover.In September 2006, she gave birth to her second child, a son.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,26334,1550177,00.htmlBritney's Baby Name: Jayden James Federline — Britney SpearsOctober 24, 2006October 6, 2010PeopleIn November 2006, Spears filed for divorce from Federline, citingirreconcilable differences.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,1556096,00.htmlBritney Spears Files for Divorce — Divorced, Britney Spears, Kevin FederlineNovember 7, 2006October 6, 2010PeopleTheir divorce was finalized in July 2007, when the couple reached a global settlement and agreed to share joint custody of their children.cite webhttp://www.eonline.com/news/55767/britney-kevin-back-to-being-singleBritney, Kevin Back to Being Single — E! OnlineJuly 30, 2007October 6, 2010HallSarahE!

Spears's aunt Sandra Bridges Covington, with whom she had been very close, died ofovarian cancerin January 2007.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20169661,00.htmlLynne Spears Visits Sister's Grave Amid Crisis — Britney Spears, Lynne SpearsJanuary 5, 2008October 6, 2010PeopleIn February, Spears stayed in adrug rehabilitationfacility inAntiguafor less than a day. The following night, she shaved her head with electric clippers at a hair salon inTarzana, Los Angeles. She admitted herself to other treatment facilities during the following weeks.cite webhttp://abcnews.go.com/Entertainment/Health/story?idBald and Broken: Inside Britney's Shaved Head February 19, 2007October 6, 2010MarikarSheila[[ABC News]]In May 2007, she produced a series of promotional concerts atHouse of Bluesvenues, titledThe M+M's Tour.cite newshttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1558527/20070502/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney's Back! Spears Returns To The Stage With Five-Song Dirty Dance PartyMay 2, 2007June 10, 2010Van HornTeriMTVIn October 2007, Spears lost physical custody of her children to Federline. The reasons of the court ruling were not revealed to the public.cite newshttp://edition.cnn.com/2007/SHOWBIZ/Music/10/01/spears.federline/index.htmlSpears will lose custody of childrenOctober 2, 2007June 11, 2010CNNSpears was also sued byLouis Vuittonover her 2005 music video "Do Somethin'" for upholstering herHummerinterior in counterfeit Louis Vuitton cherry blossom fabric, which resulted in the video being banned on European TV stations.Hollyscope Team, "Louis Vuitton Sues Britney Spears", hollyscoop.com, November 19, 2007

In October 2007, Spears released her fifth studio album,Blackout (Britney Spears album)Blackout. The album debuted at the top of charts in Canada and Ireland, number two in the U.S.Billboard200, France, Japan, Mexico and the United Kingdom and the top ten in Australia, Korea, New Zealand and many European nations. In the United States, Spears became the only female artist to have her first five studio albums debut at the two top slots of the chart.cite newshttp://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/britney-spears-debuts-1-on-european-albums-chart-and-debuts-1-on-us-digital-albums-chart-58819832.htmlBritney Spears Debuts No. 1 on European Albums Chart and Debuts No. 1 on...November 8, 2007June 11, 2010[[PR Newswire]]The album received positive reviews from critics and has sold over 3 million copies worldwide.cite newshttp://www.guardian.co.uk/music/2008/nov/28/britney-spears-circusCD review: Britney Spears: CircusNovember 28, 2008June 11, 2010PetridisAlexisThe GuardianUKcite newshttp://www.guardian.co.uk/lifeandstyle/2007/nov/11/shopping.popandrock1CDs: Britney Spears, Blackout and Kylie Minogue, XNovember 11, 2007June 11, 2010RobinsonPeterThe ObserverUKBlackoutwon Album of the Year atMTV Europe Music Awards 2008and was listed as the fifth Best Pop Album of the Decade byThe Times.cite webhttp://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/entertainment/celebrity/britney-spears-seals-comeback-with-two-996785Britney Spears seals comeback with two gongs at MTV Europe Music Awards November 7, 2008June 11, 2010LyonsBevSutherlandLauraDaily RecordScotlandcite newshttp://entertainment.timesonline.co.uk/tol/arts_and_entertainment/music/article6922991.eceThe 100 best pop albums of the Noughties November 21, 2009June 11, 2010The TimesUKAnushkaAsthanaSpears performed the lead single "Gimme More" at the2007 MTV Video Music Awards. The performance was panned by many critics.cite newshttp://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/6986539.stmBritney's MTV comeback falls flatSeptember 10, 2007February 24, 2010WillisDavidBBCDespite the backlash, the single rocketed to worldwide success, peaking at number one in Canada and the top ten in almost every country it charted.cite webhttp://acharts.us/canada_singles_top_100/2007/41Canada Singles Top 100October 13, 2007February 23, 2010Billboardacharts.uscite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/fr/showitem.asp?interpretBritney Spears – Gimme More (song)2007February 23, 2010UltratopHung MedienThe second single "Piece of Me" reached the top of the charts in Ireland and reached the top five in Australia, Canada, Denmark, New Zealand and the United Kingdom. The third single "Break the Ice (Britney Spears song)Break the Ice" was released the following year and had moderate success due to Spears not being able to promote it properly.cite webhttp://acharts.us/australia_singles_top_50/2008/06Australian Singles ChartMarch 1, 2008February 6, 2010acharts.uscite webhttp://acharts.us/uk_singles_top_75/2007/52UK Singles ChartDecember 23, 2007February 10, 2010[[The Official Charts Company]]cite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/fr/showitem.asp?interpretBritney Spears – Piece of Me(song)2008February 10, 2010Ultratop 50Hung MedienIn December 2007, Spears began a relationship withpaparazzoAdnan Ghalib.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20168997,00.htmlBritney Pap-Happy with Her New Guy — Britney SpearsJanuary 3, 2008February 12, 2010People
article.heading: 200810:Circus
article.paragraph: File:Britney SpearsMontreal3.jpgthumbuprightSpears performing "Freakshow" atThe Circus Starring Britney Spears, May 2009alt=Image of a blond female performer. She has a headset around her hand and is wearing sparkly silver and black lingerie, fishnet stockings and knee-high black boots. She stands in front of a black and golden couch.In January 2008, Spears refused to relinquish custody of her sons to Federline's representatives. She was hospitalized atCedars-Sinai Medical Centerafter police that arrived at her house noted she appeared to be under the influence of an illicit substance. The following day, Spears's visitation rights were suspended at an emergency court hearing, and Federline was given sole physical and legal custody of the children. She was committed to the psychiatric ward ofRonald Reagan UCLA Medical Centerand put on5150 (involuntary psychiatric hold)5150 involuntary psychiatric hold. The court placed her under temporary, and later, permanentcite newshttp://www.foxnews.com/story/2008/10/28/britney-spears-under-permanent-conservatorshipBritney Spears Under Permanent ConservatorshipOctober 28, 2008July 16, 2014McKayHollyFox News Channelconservatorshipof her father James Spears and attorney Andrew Wallet, giving them complete control of her assets.She was released five days later.cite newshttp://articles.latimes.com/2008/feb/07/local/me-britney7Spears is released from UCLA hospital psychiatric ward — Los Angeles TimesFebruary 7, 2008June 12, 2010BlanksteinAndrewWintonRichardLos Angeles TimesThe following month, she guest-starred on theHow I Met Your Motherepisode "Ten Sessions" as receptionist Abby. She received positive reviews for her performance, as well as bringing the series its highest ratings ever.cite newshttp://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/tv-movies/britney-spears-begins-rehab-image-wacky-cameo-cbs-sitcom-article-1.287170Britney Spears begins rehab of image with wacky cameo on CBS sitcomMarch 25, 2008June 12, 2010HinckleyD.Daily NewsNew Yorkcite newshttp://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/television/news/e3ia2cce804ce40901d82b7a82b3af831e3?imw//web.archive.org/web/20080606035305/http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/television/news/e3ia2cce804ce40901d82b7a82b3af831e3?imwJune 6, 2008Spears delivers 'Mother's' highest ratingsMarch 25, 2008June 12, 2010HibberdJames[[The Hollywood Reporter]]e5 Global MediaIn July 2008, Spears regained some visitation rights after coming to an agreement with Federline and his counsel.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20213350,00.htmlIt's Over: Britney & Kevin Reach a Custody Settlement — Scandals & Feuds, Britney Spears, Kevin FederlineJuly 18, 2008February 12, 2010LeeKenPeopleIn September 2008, Spears opened the2008 MTV Video Music AwardsMTV Video Music Awardswith a pre-taped comedy sketch withJonah Hilland an introduction speech. She wonMTV Video Music Award for Best Female VideoBest Female Video,MTV Video Music Award for Best Pop VideoBest Pop VideoandMTV Video Music Award for Video of the YearVideo of the Yearfor "Piece of Me".cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/ontv/vma/2008/Highlights, Winners, Performers and Photos from the 2008 MTV Video Music Awards2008June 12, 2010MTVA 60-minute introspective documentary,Britney: For the Record, was produced to chronicle Spears's return to the recording industry. Directed by Phil Griffin,For the Recordwas shot inBeverly Hills, Hollywood, and New York City during the third quarter of 2008.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1596736/20081009/spears_britney.jhtmlBritney Spears 'Sets The Record Straight' In Documentary Airing November 30 On MTVVenaJocelynOctober 9, 2008MTVJanuary 1, 2011The documentary was broadcast on MTV to 5.6 million viewers for the two airings on the premiere night. It was the highest rating in its Sunday night timeslot and in the network's history.cite webhttp://mtvpress.com/music/release/britney_for_the_record_scores_staggering_3_54_p12_34_rating/"Britney: For the Record" scores staggering 3.54 P12–34 rating in Sunday debut on MTVhDecember 2, 2008MTVJanuary 2, 2011

In December 2008, Spears's sixth studio albumCircus (Britney Spears album)Circuswas released. It received positive reviews from criticscite webhttp://www.metacritic.com/music/circus/britney-spearsCircus reviews at Metacritic.com[[Metacritic]]June 12, 2010and debuted at number one in Canada, Czech Republic and the United States, and inside the top ten in many European nations.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/biz/articles/news/1300468/britneys-circus-debuts-atop-album-chartBritney's 'Circus' Debuts Atop Album ChartDecember 10, 2008June 12, 2010HastyKatieBillboardIn the United States, Spears became the youngest female artist to have five albums debut at number one, earning a place inGuinness World Records.cite webhttp://www.britney.com/us/blog/britney-earns-another-guinness-world-recordBritney Earns (Another) Guinness World RecordSeptember 27, 2009June 12, 2010Britney.comShe also became the only act in the Soundscan era to have four albums debut with 500,000 or more copies sold.The album was one of the fastest-selling albums of the year,cite newshttp://www.forbes.com/lists/2009/53/celebrity-09_Britney-Spears_PREW.html#13 Britney Spears — The 2009 Celebrity 100March 6, 2009June 12, 2010ReporterStaffForbesand has sold 4 million copies worldwide.cite webhttp://www.hmv.co.jp/news/article/909250129/Britney Spears' Singles CollectionHMV Store JapanJune 1, 2010June 1, 2010Its lead single, "Womanizer (song)Womanizer", became Spears's first number one in theBillboardHot 100 since "...Baby One More Time". The single also topped the charts in Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Finland, France, Norway and Sweden.cite newshttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/1043782/spears-scores-record-setting-hot-100-jumpSpears Scores Record-Setting Hot 100 JumpOctober 15, 2008June 12, 2010ReporterBillboardBillboardNielsen Companycite webhttp://www.ultratop.be/en/showitem.asp?interpretBritney Spears — Womanizer (song)2008June 12, 2010UltratopHung MedienIt was also nominated for a Grammy in the category of Best Dance Recording.cite newshttp://www2.grammy.com/grammy_awards/52nd_show/list.aspxNominees list for the 52nd Grammy AwardsDecember 2, 2009Los Angeles TimesDecember 3, 2009In January 2009, Spears and her father James obtained a restraining order against her former manager Sam Lutfi, ex-boyfriend Adnan Ghalib and attorney Jon Eardley all of whom, court documents claim, had been conspiring to gain control of Spears's affairs. The restraining order forbids Lutfi and Ghalib from contacting Spears or coming within 250 yards of her, her property or family members.cite webhttp://www.tvguide.com/News/Britney-Restraining-Order-1002335.aspxBritney Gets Restraining Order Against Former Manager, Ex-Beau and AttorneyJanuary 31, 2009June 12, 2010MitovichMatt[[TV Guide]]OpenGate CapitalSpears embarked onThe Circus Starring Britney Spearsin March 2009. With a gross of U.S. $131.8 million, it became the fifth highest grossing tour of the year.cite webhttp://www.pollstarpro.com/SpecialFeatures2009/2009YearEndTop50WorldwideConcertTours.pdf2009 Year End Top 50 Worldwide Concert Tours2010February 8, 2010[[Pollstar]]

In November 2009, Spears released her second greatest hits album,The Singles Collection (Britney Spears album)The Singles Collection. The album's lead and only single, "3 (Britney Spears song)3" became her third number one single in the U.S.cite newshttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/267070/3-to-1-britney-beats-odds-to-debut-atop-hot-100'3' To 1: Britney Beats Odds To Debut Atop Hot 100October 14, 2009January 4, 2010PietroluongoSilvioBillboardNielsen CompanyIn May 2010, Spears's representatives confirmed she was dating her agent Jason Trawick, and that they had decided to end their professional relationship to focus on their personal relationship.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20368457,00.htmlBritney Spears and Jason Trawick Split – Professionally — Britney SpearsMay 11, 2010June 12, 2010JordanJuliePeopleSpears designed a limited edition clothing line forCandie's, which was released in stores in July 2010.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1642722/britney-spears-design-clothing-candies.jhtmlBritney Spears To Design Clothing For Candie'sVenaJocelynJune 30, 2010April 5, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksIn September 2010, she made a cameo appearance on a Spears-themed tribute episode of American TV showGlee (TV series)Glee, titled "Britney/Brittany". The episode drewGlee's highest ratings ever.cite webhttp://blog.zap2it.com/frominsidethebox/2010/09/glee-ratings-britney-is-bigger-than-madonna.html'Glee' ratings: Britney is bigger than MadonnaRickPorter[[Zap2it]][[Tribune Media Services]]September 29, 2010September 29, 2010cite webhttp://tvbythenumbers.zap2it.com/2010/09/29/tuesday-finals-glee-no-ordinary-family-ncis-dancing-up-raising-hope-detroit-1-8-7-running-wilde-down/65835/Tuesday Finals: Glee, No Ordinary Family, NCIS, Dancing Up; Raising Hope, Detroit 1–8–7, Running Wilde DownGormanBillSeptember 29, 2010TV by the NumbersSeptember 29, 2010
article.heading: 201112:Femme FataleandThe X Factor
article.paragraph: In March 2011, Spears released her seventh studio albumFemme Fatale (Britney Spears album)Femme Fatale.cite webhttp://www.rcarecords.com/news/7th-britney-spears-album-femme-fatale-set-for-march-29th-release7th Britney Spears Album 'Femme Fatale' Set for March 29th ReleaseJive RecordsAugust 2, 2011March 6, 2011The album peaked at number one in the United States, Canada, and Australia, and peaked inside the top ten on nearly every other chart. Its peak in the United States ties Britney withMariah CareyandJanet Jacksonfor the third-most number ones among women.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/472190/britney-spears-snares-sixth-no-1-on-billboard-200-with-femme-fataleBritney Spears Snares Sixth No. 1 on Billboard 200 with 'Femme Fatale'BillboardSeptember 14, 2009April 24, 2011It has sold 1,000,000 copies in the United States and 2.2 million worldwide, and has been certified platinum by theRecording Industry Association of AmericaRIAA.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/469344/adele-katy-perry-rule-mid-year-soundscan-chartsAdele, Katy Perry Rule Mid-Year SoundScan ChartsBillboardJune 6, 2011June 9, 2011cite certificationUnited StatesBritney SpearsalbumThe album's lead single "Hold It Against Me" debuted at number-one on theBillboard Hot 100''Billboard'' Hot 100, becoming Spears's fourth number-one single on the chart and making her the second artist in history to have two consecutive singles debut at number-one, afterMariah Carey.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/473718/britney-spears-hold-it-against-me-single-premieresBritney Spears' 'Hold It Against Me' Single PremieresBillboardJanuary 10, 2011May 25, 2013The second single "Till the World Ends" reached peaked at number three on theBillboardHot 100 in May,cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/471630/adeles-rolling-in-the-deep-tops-hot-100Listen: Britney Spears, Nicki Minaj and Ke$ha's 'Till the World Ends' Remix.BillboardSeptember 14, 2009August 20, 2011while the third single "I Wanna Go" reached number seven in August.Femme Fatalebecame Spears's first album in which three of its songs reached the top ten of the chart.BillboardURLbyNameglynn kerslakeallThe fourth and final single "Criminal (Britney Spears song)Criminal" was released in September 2011. The music video caused controversy when British politicians criticized Spears for using replica guns while filming the video in an area of London that had been badly affected by the2011 England riots.cite webhttp://www.digitalspy.co.uk/music/news/a341976/britney-spears-angers-mps-over-criminal-video-shoot.htmlBritney Spears angers MPs over 'Criminal' video shootCopseyRobertDigital Spy. Hachette Filipacchi (UK) LtdOctober 31, 2011September 23, 2011Spears's management briefly responded, stating, "The video is a fantasy story featuring Britney's boyfriend, Jason Trawick, which literally plays out the lyrics of a song written three years before the riots ever happened."cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1671542/britney-spears-criminal-video-gun-criticism-response.jhtmlBritney Spears Responds To 'Criminal' Video ControversyMontgomeryJamesSeptember 26, 2011October 31, 2011MTV. MTV NetworksIn April 2011, Spears appeared in a remix ofRihanna's song "S&M (song)S&M".cite webVenaJocelynhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1661717/britney-spears-rihanna.jhtmlRihanna Says Britney Spears' 'S&M' Remix 'Had To Be Major'MTVApril 11, 2011April 24, 2011It reached number one in the US later in the month, giving Spears her fifth number one on the chart.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/471954/rihannas-sm-reigns-on-hot-100-lady-gagas-judas-debutsRihanna's 'S&M' Reigns on Hot 100, Lady Gaga's 'Judas' DebutsTrustGaryApril 20, 2011September 26, 2011BillboardOnBillboard's 2011 Year-End list, Spears was ranked number fourteen on the Artists of the Year,cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/charts/year-end/2011/top-artists?beginBest of 2011: The ArtistsDecember 19, 2011Billboardthirty-two onBillboard200 artists and ten onBillboardHot 100 artists.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/charts/year-end/2011/the-billboard-200-artists?beginBest of 2011: Billboard 200 ArtistsDecember 19, 2011Billboardcite webhttp://www.billboard.com/charts/year-end/2011/hot-100-artistsBest of 2011: Hot 100 ArtistsDecember 19, 2011BillboardFile:Britney GM Detroit FFT.jpgleftthumbSpears performing "Gimme More" at theFemme Fatale Tour, July 2011alt=Image of a blond female performer surrounded by a group of dancers. She is sitting on a purple coach and wearing a golden outfit. The dancers are wearing short black hooded sweatshirts.In June 2011, Spears embarked on theFemme Fatale Tour.cite press releasehttp://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/pop-superstar-britney-spears-announces-special-guest-nicki-minaj-to-join-the-highly-anticipated-all-female-femme-fatale-tour-119685009.htmlPop Superstar Britney Spears Announces Special Guest Nicki Minaj to Join the Highly Anticipated All Female Femme Fatale Tour[[PR Newswire]][[Live Nation]]April 12, 2011April 12, 2011The first ten dates of the tour grossed $6.2 million, landing the fifty-fifth spot on Pollstar's Top 100 North American Tours list for the half-way point of the year.cite webhttp://www.pollstarpro.com/files/Charts2011/07181Ttop100NorthAmericanTours.pdfTop 100 North American ToursPollstarJune 30, 2011July 9, 2011The tour ended on December 10, 2011 in Puerto Rico after 79 performances.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1675774/britney-spears-tour-wrap.jhtmlBritney Spears Wraps Femme Fatale TourMTVdateDecember 19, 2011A DVD of the tour was released in November 2011.cite webhttp://www.amazon.com/Britney-Spears-Live-Femme-Fatale/dp/B005TQAI6G/refBritney Spears Live: The Femme Fatale Tour (2011)Amazon.comOctober 25, 2011October 25, 2011In August 2011, Spears received theMTV Video Vanguard Awardat the2011 MTV Video Music Awards.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1669862/britney-spears-lady-gaga-kiss-vmas.jhtmlBritney Spears Accepts Video Vanguard VMA – And A Kiss From Lady GagaAugust 28, 2011August 28, 2011MTV. MTV NetworksMitchellJohnThe next month, she released her second remix album,B in the Mix: The Remixes Vol. 2.cite webhttp://idolator.com/6006322/britney-b-in-the-mix-remixes-vol-2-track-listingBritney Spears Reveals 'B In The Mix: The Remixes Vol. 2′ Track ListingSeptember 9, 2011September 9, 2011BainBecky[[Idolator (website)|Idolator]]. [[Buzz Media]]In December, Spears became engaged to her long-time boyfriend Jason Trawick, who had formerly been her agent.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1676248/britney-spears-engagement-ring.jhtmlBritney Spears' Engagement Ring: How Does It Stack Up?December 19, 2011December 19, 2011MTV NewsVenaJocelynTrawick became a co-conservator of Spears, alongside her father, in April 2012.cite webhttp://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/britney-spears-fiance-jason-trawick-approved-as-co-conservator-2012254Britney Spears' Fiance Jason Trawick Approved as Co-ConservatorApril 25, 2012January 12, 2013Us WeeklyEggenbergerNicoleIn January 2013, Spears and Trawick ended their engagement. Trawick was also removed as Spears's co-conservator, restoring her father as the sole conservator.cite webhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20657207,00.htmlBritney Spears and Jason Trawick SplitPeopleLaudadioMarisaJanuary 11, 2013January 12, 2013cite webhttp://www.tmz.com/2013/01/11/britney-spears-jason-trawick-break-up-split-divorce/Britney Spears and Jason Trawick – SPLITTMZJanuary 11, 2013January 12, 2013

In May 2012, Spears was hired to replaceNicole Scherzingeras a judge for theThe X Factor (U.S. season 2)second seasonof theThe X Factor (U.S. TV series)U.S. versionofThe X Factor, joiningSimon Cowell,L.A. Reidand fellow new judgeDemi Lovato, who replacedPaula Abdul. With a reported salary of $15 million, she became the highest-paid judge on a singing competition series in television history.cite webhttp://www.eonline.com/news/307137/britney-spears-will-get-record-15-million-payday-to-be-x-factor-judgeBritney Spears Will Get Record $15 Million Payday to Be X Factor JudgeBromleyMelanieApril 12, 2012April 12, 2012[[E!]]She mentored the Teens category; her final act,Carly Rose Sonenclar, was named the runner-up of the season. Spears did not return for the show's third season and her spot was filled byKelly Rowland.cite webhttp://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2013/01/britney-spears-officially-leaving-the-x-factor/Britney Spears Officially Leaving 'The X Factor'ABC NewsJanuary 11, 2013May 25, 2013cite webLarkinMikehttp://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-2328154/Kelly-Rowland-Paulina-Rubio-replace-Britney-Spears-L-A-Reid-new-season-The-X-Factor.htmlKelly Rowland and Paulina Rubio replace Britney Spears and L.A. Reid for new season of The X FactorDaily MailMay 21, 2013April 3, 2014Spears was featured onwill.i.am's "Scream & Shout", which was released as a single from his fourth studio album,Willpower (will.i.am album)#willpower(2013). The song later became Spears's sixth number one single on the UK Singles Chart and peaked at #3 on USBillboardHot 100. Scream & Shout was among the best selling songs of 2012 and 2013 with denoting sales of over 8.1 million worldwide, the accompanying music video was the third most viewed video in 2013 onVEVOdespite the video being released in 2012.cite webhttp://www.entertainmentwise.com/news/68479/william-Teases-Britney-Spears-Shakira-Alicia-Keys-Collaborationswill.i.am Teases Britney Spears, Shakira, Alicia Keys CollaborationsKitchenerShaunJanuary 30, 2012September 11, 2011Entertainment Wisefailed verificationJanuary 2015In December,Forbesmagazine named her music's top-earning woman of 2012, with estimated earnings of $58 million.cite webhttp://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2012/12/britney-spears-is-musics-top-earning-woman-of-2012/Britney Spears Is Music's Top Earning Woman of 2012ABC NewsDecember 12, 2012January 4, 2013

It began on December 27, 2013, and will include a total of 100 shows throughout 2014 and 2015.cite webhttp://idolator.com/7484654/britney-spears-vegas-piece-of-me-planet-hollywoodBritney Spears Announces 2-Year 'Piece Of Me' Vegas Residency, December 3 Album ReleaseWilliottCarlIdolator. for Britney: Piece of Me.cite webhttp://music-mix.ew.com/2013/11/25/britney-jean-stream/Britney Spears' new album 'Britney Jean' now streaming on iTunesJake PearlmanEntertainment WeeklyNovember 25, United States.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1718871/britney-spears-has-lowest-chart-debut-with-britney-jean.jhtmlBritney Spears Has Lowest Chart Debut With Britney JeanGil KaufmanMTV News. ViacomDecember 11, 2013December 11, 2013Britney Jeandebuted at number 34 on theUK Albums Chart, selling 12,959 copies in its first week. In doing so, it became Spears's lowest-charting and lowest-selling album in the country.cite webhttp://thehonestyhour.com/2013/12/better-work-britney-britney-jean-debuts-34-uk/You Better Work, Britney: 'Britney Jean' Debuts at No. 34 in UKThe Honesty HourDecember 8, 2013December 8, 2013

"Work Bitch" was released as the lead single fromBritney Jeanon September 16, 2013, one day earlier than expected after beingInternet leakleakedonline.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/pop-shop/5695450/britney-spears-work-bitch-leaks-online-listenBritney Spears Debuts 'Work Bitch' Following Leak By 'One Bad Apple': ListenBillboardSeptember 15, 2013November 20, 2013It debuted and peaked at number 12 on the U.S.Billboard Hot 100''Billboard'' Hot 100marking Spears's 31st song on the chart and the fifth highest debut of her career on the chart, and her seventh in the top 20. It also marked Spears's 19th top 20 hit and overall her 23rd top 40 hit. It also entered the top 10 on the U.S Billboard Hot Digital Songs chart at number 6 and debuted at number 2 on both the U.S.Billboard chart''Billboard'' chart's Hot Dance Club Songs and Hot Dance/Electronic Songs. Also its debut on the U.S.BillboardPop Songs chart at number 25, marks Spears's 31st chart entry, pushing her pastMariah Carey(30) for the second-most entries to the chart's October 3, 1992, launch. The song marked Spears's highest sales debut since her 2011 number one hit "Hold It Against Me". "Work Bitch" also had commercial success in the UK debuting and peaking at number 7 on theUK Singles Chartand also peaked at number 2 on theUK Dance Chart. The song also charted well in several other countries, peaking within the top ten of the charts in Brazil, Canada, France, Italy, Mexico, Spain and South Korea.cite webGreinPaulhttp://music.yahoo.com/blogs/chart-watch/week-ending-sept-22-2013-songs-brit-back-204122521.htmlWeek Ending Sept. 22, 2013. webSamLanskyhttp://www.idolator.com/7490455/britney-spears-unveils-britney-jean-album-cover-pens-emotional-letter-to-fansBritney Spears Unveils 'Britney Jean' Album Cover, Pens Emotional Letter To FansIdolator.comOctober 25, 2013November 20, 2013cite webBusisHillaryhttp://music-mix.ew.com/2013/11/03/britney-spears-perfume-listen/Britney Spears spritzes fans with new single 'Perfume' – SoundtrackBillboardApril 17, 2013April 17, 2013In October 2013, she was featured as a guest vocalist onMiley Cyrus's track "SMS (Bangerz)", taken from her fourth studio albumBangerz(2013).cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/5687337/miley-cyrus-reveals-bangerz-tracklist-after-breaking-vevo-recordMiley Cyrus Reveals 'Bangerz' Tracklist as 'Wrecking Ball' Breaks VEVO RecordBillboardSeptember 10, 2013September 15, 2013It debuted in theBillboardcharts at number 10 inBubbling Under Hot 100 SinglesU.S. Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles, number 29 in the U.S. Pop Digital Singles, and number 70 in the U.S.Hot Digital Songs.

On January 8, 2014, Spears won Favorite Pop Artist at the40th People's Choice Awardsat theMicrosoft Theaterin Los Angeles.cite webhttp://www.peopleschoice.com/pca/awards/nominees/People's Choice Awards 2014 NomineesPeoplesChoice.comApril 3, 2014For the week of July 26, 2014, "Alien (Britney Spears song)Alien" debuted and peaked at number 8 on theBubbling Under Hot 100 SinglesUS Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singlesdespite not being released as a single fromBritney Jean.cite webBubbling Under Hot 100: July 26, 2014http://www.billboard.com/biz/charts/2014-07-26/bubbling-under-hot-100-singles[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]July 17, 2014In August 2014, Spears confirmed she had renewed her contract with RCA, and that she is writing and recording new music for her next album.cite webBarkerAndrewBritney Spears: Popstar Directs Clear Vision of Her Billion-Dollar Empirehttp://variety.com/2014/music/news/britney-spears-interview-las-vegas-residency-1201293159/VarietyAugust 29, 2014Spears announced through her Twitter account in August 2014 that she would be releasing an intimate apparel titled "The Intimate Britney Spears". It was available to be purchased on September 9, 2014 in the United States and Canada through Spears's Intimate Collection website. It was later available on September 25 for purchase in Europe. The company now ships to over 200 countries including Australia and New Zealand.On September 25, 2014, Spears confirmed onGood Morning Britain (2014 TV programme)Good Morning Britainthat she had extended her contract with The AXIS and Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino, to continue Britney: Piece Of Me for two additional years.cite webRigbySamBritney Spears confirms 2-year Las Vegas residency extensionhttp://www.digitalspy.com/music/news/a599029/britney-spears-confirms-2-year-las-vegas-residency-extension.html#~oRzKsvLdndchB5[[Digital Spy]].
