article.heading: Artistry
Musical style
article.paragraph: Following her debut, Spears was credited with leading the revival ofteen popin the late 1990s.The Daily Yomiurireported that "[m]usic critics have hailed her as the most gifted teenage pop idol for many years, but Spears has set her sights a little higher-she is aiming for the level of superstardom that has been achieved by Madonna andJanet Jackson."Cite newsTeen pop idols stage comebackYomiuri Shimbun1November 25, 1999Rob Sheffield ofRolling Stonewrote: "Britney Spears carries on the classic archetype of the rock & roll teen queen, the dungaree doll, the angel baby who just has to make a scene."cite webOops!...I Did It Again – Album Reviewhttp://www.rollingstone.com/music/albumreviews/oops-i-did-it-again-20040609SheffieldRobJune 9, 2004October 8, 2009Rolling StoneFollowing the release of her debut album, Chuck Taylor ofBillboardobserved, "Spears has become a consummate performer, with snappy dance moves, a clearly real-albeit young-and funkdified voice ... "(You Drive Me) Crazy", her third single ... demonstrates Spears's own development, proving that the 17-year-old is finding her own vocal personality after so many months of steadfast practice."Cite newsTaylorChuckBritney Spears: (You Drive Me) CrazyBillboard1113527August 28, 1999Stephen Thomas Erlewine of Allmusic referred to her music as a "blend of infectious, rap-inflected dance-pop and smooth balladry."cite webErlewineStephen...Baby One More Time{{Allmusic|class1999October 8, 2009

Oops!...I Did It Againand subsequent albums saw Spears working with several contemporary R&B producers, leading to "a combination of bubblegum, urban soul, andraga."cite webErlewineStephenOops!...I Did It Again{{Allmusic|class2000October 8, 2009Her third studio album,Britneyderived from the teen pop niche, "[r]hythmically and melodically ... sharper, tougher than what came before. What used to be unabashedly frothy has some disco grit, underpinned by Spears' spunky self-determination that helps sell hooks that are already catchier, by and large, than those that populated her previous two albums."cite webErlewineStephenBritney{{Allmusic|class2001October 8, 2009

SinceIn the Zone, Spears has explored and heavily incorporated the genres ofSynthpopelectropopanddance musicin her albums, as well as influences ofurban contemporaryurbanandhip hop musicwhich are most present inIn the ZoneandBlackout. She has also experimented with genres such asdubstep, first onBlackout's "Freakshow" and again on "Hold It Against Me" fromFemme Fatale.cite journalBlackout — BlenderOctober 30, 2007LimDennis[[Blender (magazine)|Blender]]1534-0554harvcite webNew Music: Britney Spears f/ will.i.am – 'Big Fat Bass'http://www.rap-up.com/2011/03/12/new-music-britney-spears-f-will-i-am-big-fat-bass/[[Rap-Up]]November 3, 2012cite web'Hold It Against Me' Is Primo Britneyhttp://www.rollingstone.com/culture/blogs/pop-life/hold-it-against-me-is-primo-britney-20110110[[Rolling Stone]]November 3, 2012cite webMarikarSheilaBritney Spears Drops 'Till the World Ends,' Mimics Ke$hahttp://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2011/03/britney-spears-drops-till-the-world-ends-keha/[[ABC News]]November 3, 2012cite webLipshutzJasonBritney Spears, Till the World Endshttp://www.billboard.com/articles/review/1067901/britney-spears-till-the-world-ends[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]November 3, 2012cite webGanzCarynSpears at her most daring and innovative — really! Dark, dangerous, fascinating.http://www.emusic.com/music-news/review/album/britney-spears-blackout/[[eMusic]]November 3, 2012
article.heading: Vocals
article.paragraph: ListenrightBritney Spears - You Got It All.ogg"You Got It All"The cover of [[The Jets (Minnesota band)|The Jets]]' song was the first song recorded by Spears for her then-label Jive in 1997.{{harvnb|Knopper|2009|pp[[Ogg]]Britney Spears - Freakshow.ogg"Freakshow"The track is built around the 'wobbler' effect of [[dubstep]], and her vocals are pitched down low, making her sound masculine.{{cite web |urlSpears possesses asopranosoubrettevocal range of three octaves and two notes.Cite webCritic of Music: Vocal Range and Profile: Britney Spearshttp://www.criticofmusic.com/2012/11/vocal-profile-britney-spears.htmlwww.criticofmusic.comJune 23, 2015Prior to her breakthrough success, she is described as having sung "much deeper than her highly recognizable trademark voice of today", with Eric Foster White, who worked with Spears for her debut album...Baby One More Time (album)...Baby One More Time, being cited as "[shaping] her voice over the course of a month" upon being signed toJive Records"to where it is todaydistinctively, unmistakably Britney".harvnbHughes2005145Rami Yacoub who co-produced Spears's debut album with lyricist Max Martin, commented, "I know fromDenniz Popand Max's previous productions, when we do songs, there's kind of a nasal thing. With N' Sync and the Backstreet Boys, we had to push for that mid-nasal voice. When Britney did that, she got this kind of raspy, sexy voice."cite bookBronsonFredThe Billboard book of number 1 hitsBillboard Books2003377978-0-8230-7677-2Guy Blackman ofThe Agewrote that "[t]he thing about Spears, though, is that her biggest songs, no matter how committee-created or impossibly polished, have always been convincing because of her delivery, her commitment and her presence. [...] Spears expresses perfectly the conflicting urges of adolescence, the tension between chastity and sexual experience, between hedonism and responsibility, between confidence and vulnerability."Cite newsBlackmanGuyMusical Spearshttp://www.theage.com.au/news/entertainment/music/2009/10/24/1256147928875.html[[The Age]]August 25, 2009November 21, 2009MelbourneProducerWilliam Orbit, who collaborated with Spears on her albumBritney Jean, stated regarding her vocals: "[Britney] didn't get so big just because [she] put on great shows; [she] got to be that way because [her voice is] unique: you hear two words and you know who is singing".cite newshttp://www.hungertv.com/feature/interview-william-orbit/The Interview: William OrbitHunger TVJune 20, 2014January 2, 2015On the other hand, she has been highly criticized by some for her vocal ability as well as her use ofAuto-Tunethroughout her career.cite newshttp://www.slantmagazine.com/music/music_review.asp?ID"Blackout" reviewCinquemaniSalSlant magazineOctober 23, 2007February 20, 2010Cite bookGiddinsGaryNatural selection: Gary Giddins on comedy, film, music, and books[[Oxford University Press]]2882006978-0-19-517951-4Cite newshttp://www.guardian.co.uk/music/2011/mar/24/britney-spears-femme-fatale-reviewFemme Fatale reviewLondonAlexisPetridisMarch 25, 2011March 25, 2011[[The Guardian]]Guardian News and Media
article.heading: Influences
article.paragraph: Spears has cited her major influences in her career as beingMadonna (entertainer)Madonna,Janet JacksonandWhitney Houston, her "three favorite artists" as a child whom she would "sing along to [...] day and night in [her] living room"; Houston's "I Have Nothing" was the song she auditioned to that landed her record deal with Jive Records.cite AV mediaHorvitz, Louis J. (Director)November 16, 2012We Will Always Love You: A Grammy Salute to Whitney HoustonTV specialUnited StatesCBSThroughout her career, Spears has drawn frequent comparisons to Madonna and Jackson in particular, in terms of vocals, choreography and stage presence. According to Spears: "I know when I was younger, I looked up to people... like, you know, Janet Jackson and Madonna. And they were major inspirations for me. But I also had my own identity and I knew who I was, you know."Cite newsMasleyEdThe State of Britneydom: Teen-pop Queen declares 'I'm on the verge of being a woman'Pittsburgh Post-GazetteW.22November 2, 20011068624XIn the 2002 bookMadonnastyleby Carol Clerk, she is quoted saying: "I have been a huge fan of Madonna since I was a little girl. She's the person that I've really looked up to. I would really, really like to be a legend like Madonna."cite bookClerkCarolMadonnastyleOmnibus Press200256978-0-7119-8874-3After meeting Spears face to face, Janet Jackson stated: "she said to me, 'I'm such a big fan; I really admire you.' That's so flattering. Everyone gets inspiration from some place. And it's awesome to see someone else coming up who's dancing and singing, and seeing how all these kids relate to her. A lot of people put it down, but what she does is a positive thing."Cite newsGardnerElysaLuscious JacksonUSA TodayJuly 28, 20001.E07347456harvMadonna said of Spears in the documentaryBritney: For the Record: "I admire her talent as an artist [...] There are aspects about her that I recognize in myself when I first started out in my career".cite AV mediaGriffin, Phil (Director)November 30, 2008Britney: For the RecordDocumentaryUnited StatesMTVShe has also namedMichael Jackson,Mariah Carey,Sheryl Crow,Otis Redding,Shania Twain,Brandy NorwoodBrandy,Natalie Imbruglia,Justin Timberlake,Bruno Marsand others contemporaries as sources of inspiration.Cite newsHarrisonShane'Britney' strengthens claim to pop tiara[[The Atlanta Journal-Constitution]]C.1November 6, 2001cite web//www.youtube.com/watch?vBritney Spears flashback – March 1999YouTubeMay 25, 2013cite webhttp://lasvegasblog.harrahs.com/las-vegas-entertainment/exclusive-interview-britney-spears-on-tabloid-fame-and-vegas-takeover/#sthash.I4BASJ84.dpufExclusive Interview: Britney Spears On Tabloid Fame and Vegas TakeoverNovember 12, 2013November 12, 2013Vegas Playerhttp://www.webcitation.org/6L51BVdQ0November 12, 2013cite web//www.youtube.com/watch?vBritney Spears 1998 first interviewYouTubeJanuary 2, 2015cite webhttp://www.usatoday.com/story/life/music/2013/12/29/britney-spears-inspired-by-beyonce-bruno-justin-timberlake/4218939/Who inspires Britney? Beyonce, Bruno and her ex JTUSA TodayDecember 29, 2013June 3, 2014MarcoCava
article.heading: Legacy
article.paragraph: see alsoList of awards and nominations received by Britney SpearsFile:Britney Spears Hollywood Star.jpgrightthumbSpears's star on theHollywood Walk of FameSpears became an internationalpop iconpop culture iconimmediately after launching her recording career.Rolling Stonemagazine wrote: "One of the most controversial and successful female vocalists of the 21st century," she "spearheaded the rise of post-millennial teen pop ... Spears early on cultivated a mixture of innocence and experience that broke the bank".cite webBritney Spears: Biography: Rolling StoneRolling Stone2008http://www.rollingstone.com/music/artists/britney-spears/biographyAugust 9, 2008She is listed by theGuinness World Recordsas having the "Best-selling album by a teenage solo artist" for her debut album...Baby One More Timewhich sold over thirteen million copies in the United States.cite bookFolkardClaireGuinness World Records 2003Bantam Books2003288978-0-553-58636-7Melissa Ruggieri of theRichmond Times-Dispatchreported, "She's also marked for being the best-selling teenage artist. Before she turned 20 in 2001, Spears sold more than 37 million albums worldwide".Cite newsRuggieriMelissaMusic Notes[[Richmond Times-Dispatch]]D.13December 19, 2000As of 2011, she has sold over 100 million albums worldwide, making her one of theList of best-selling music artistsbest-selling music artistsof all time based on album sales alone.cite newshttp://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/britney-spears-pictured-backstage-at-rock-89309Britney Spears pictured backstage at Rock Of Ages with Shane WardMoodieClemmieDaily MirrorUKNovember 3, 2011February 23, 2012She was also ranked as the fourthVH1's "50 Greatest Women of the Video Era" show list, ahead of most of her contemporaries and only behind veterans Madonna, Janet Jackson, and Whitney Houston.cite webhttp://www.vh1.com/photos/gallery/?thumbnailsThe Greatest: 50 Greatest Women of the Video EraDecember 17, 2009VH1. MTV NetworksSpears is also recognized as the best-selling female artist of the first decade of the 21st century, as well as the fifth overall.cite webhttp://music.yahoo.com/blogs/chart-watch/chart-watch-extra-the-top-20-album-sellers-of-the-2000s.htmlChart Watch Extra: The Top 20 Album Sellers Of The 2000sMay 29, 2009May 3, 2010GreinPaul[[Yahoo! Music]]In December 2009,Billboardmagazine ranked Spears the 8th Artist of the 2000s decade in the United States.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/266420/artists-of-the-decadeArtists of the Decade2010May 3, 2010Billboard

Spears is also known for her iconic performances and music videos.cite webhttp://www.vh1.com/music/tuner/2011-12-02/the-30-greatest-britney-spears-songs/The 30 Greatest Britney Spears Songs (In Honor Of Her 30th Birthday)December 2, 2011March 6, 2012GrahamMarkGeorgeKatThe music video for her debut single, "...Baby One More Time", was ranked number one onTotal Request LiveTRL'sFinal Countdown of the most iconic music videos.cite newshttp://latimesblogs.latimes.com/showtracker/2008/11/review-trls-tot.htmlLos Angeles TimesShow TrackerRobertLloydNovember 17, 2008At the2000 MTV Video Music Awards, before performing "Oops!... I Did It Again (song)Oops!... I Did It Again", the singer appeared behind a backlit screen, and descended a spiral staircase and started performing "(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction", while wearing atuxedo.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1428580/britney-eminem-nsync-get-wild-weird-vma-sets.jhtmlBritney, Eminem, 'NSYNC Get Wild, Weird For VMA SetsBashamDavidSeptember 7, 2000August 27, 2011After performing a shortened version of the track, she tore the tuxedo off, revealing a skin-tight flesh-coloured outfit.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/ontv/vma/2000/MTV Video Music Awards of 2000September 6, 2000August 27, 2011The following year, Spears performed her single "I'm a Slave 4 U". Jocelyn Vena of MTV summarized the performance, saying, "draping herself in a white python and slithering around a steamy garden setting surrounded by dancers in zebra and tiger outfits Spears created one of the most striking visuals in the 27-year history of the show."cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1669706/britney-spears-mtv-vma-history.jhtmlVenaJocelynBritney Spears' Iconic VMA History: Snakes, Stripteases And SmoochesAugust 25, 2011March 6, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksShe also duetted "The Way You Make Me Feel" with pop singerMichael Jacksonat his 30th anniversary concert a few days earlier.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1614768/britney-spears-on-michael-jacksons-death-im-devastated.jhtmlBritney Spears On Michael Jackson's Death: 'I'm Devastated'June 26, 2009March 6, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksAswadJenDuring the opening of the2003 MTV Video Music Awardson August 28, 2003, Spears joined Madonna, Christina Aguilera, and Missy Elliott.cite newshttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1477729/20030828/spears_britney.jhtmlMadonna Smooches With Britney And Christina; Justin, Coldplay Win Big At VMAsMossCoreyAugust 23, 2003August 12, 2009Halfway through the performance, Madonna kissed Spears and Aguilera on the lips.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/ontv/vma/2003/MTV VMA 2003 highlights – Madonna performance videoAugust 24, 2009The kiss between Spears and Madonna generated strong reaction from the media.cite webhttp://www.monstersandcritics.com/people/news/article_1231611.php/Paglia_The_rise_and_fall_of_Britney_SpearsCamille Paglia says Madonna Gave Britney the 'Kiss of Death'PagliaCamilleDecember 8, 2006Us WeeklyAugust 12, 2009Camille PagliaThis performance was listed byBlender (magazine)Blendermagazine as one of the twenty-five sexiest music moments on television history.cite journalThe 25 Sexiest Music Moments in TV History!CollisJonahWeinerFebruary 15, 2004[[Blender (magazine)|Blender]]1534-0554harvMTV listed the performance as the number-one opening moments in the history ofMTV Video Music Awards.cite newshttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1593419/20080822/madonna.jhtmlThe Top 10 Opening Moments In VMA History: From Madonna To The PresentVeraJocelynAugust 24, 2008August 12, 2009

Barbara Ellen ofThe Observerhas reported: "Spears is famously one of the 'oldest' teenagers pop has ever produced, almost middle aged in terms of focus and determination. Many 19-year-olds haven't even started working by that age, whereas Britney, a former Mouseketeer, was that most unusual and volatile of American phenomena  a child with a full-time career. While other little girls were putting posters on their walls, Britney was wanting to be the poster on the wall. Whereas other children develop at their own pace, Britney was developing at a pace set by the ferociously competitive American entertainment industry".Cite newsEllenBarbaraComment: Britney Spears: Growing up is hard to do: America's apple- pie cheerleader is feeling the pressure as she tries to break free from her clean teen image. So is it all proving too much for Britney Inc, as she pulls out of tonight's Smash Hits Poll Winners' party and takes to her bed: The Observer Profile: Britney Spears[[The Observer]]27December 10, 200000297712In 2011, Adam Markovitz ofEntertainment Weeklycommented on the cultural significance of Spears's voice and music. "We don't ask a whole lot from Britney Spears as an entertainer...we'll still send her straight up the charts simply because she's Britney. She's an American institution, as deeply sacred and messed up as pro wrestling or the filibuster. Musically, though, Spears will always have to measure up to her own gold standards of pop euphony: the operatic slither of 2004's 'Toxic' and the candied funk of 2000's 'Oops!...I Did It Again.' Spears is no technical singer, that's for sure. But backed by Martin and Dr. Luke's wall of pound, her vocals melt into a mix of babytalk coo and coital panting that is, in its own overprocessed way, just as iconic and propulsive asMichael Jackson's yips orEminem's snarls."cite webhttp://www.ew.com/ew/article/0,,20475684,00.htmlMusic Review: Femme FataleMarkovitzAdamEntertainment WeeklyMarch 23, 2011March 24, 2011'Britney Spears' wasYahoo!'s most popular search term between 2005 and 2008, and has been in a total of seven different years.cite webhttp://www.nbcwashington.com/entertainment/celebrity/Britney_Spears_Tops_Yahoo_Searches.htmlBritney Spears Tops Yahoo SearchesDecember 1, 2008April 5, 2012[[WRC-TV|NBC Washington]]Spears was named as Most Searched Person in theGuinness World Recordsbook edition 2007 and 2009.cite webhttp://www.nbcchicago.com/entertainment/celebrity/Angelina__Brad___Britney_Set_Guinness_World_Records.htmlAngelina, Brad & Britney Set Guinness World RecordsSeptember 15, 2008March 6, 2012NBC ChicagoShe was later named as the most searched person of the decade 2000 2009.cite webhttp://www.techdigest.tv/2009/12/britney_spears_1.htmlBritney Spears is the most searched for celebrity of the decadeLynchGeraldDecember 21, 2009May 26, 2012techdigest.tv

Spears has been cited as a musical inspiration by contemporary artists.Gwyneth Paltrow's character in 2010 drama filmCountry Strongwas inspired on the singer's public meltdown. According to film director Shana Fest, "that's where this movie came from. I mean, I was seeing what was happening in the media to Britney Spears. I think it's tragic how we treat people who give us so much, and we love to see them knocked down to build them back up again, to knock them down again."cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1654456/britney-spears-inspired-country-strong-lead-director.jhtmlBritney Spears Inspired 'Country Strong' Lead, Director SaysDecember 16, 2010March 6, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksZiegbeMawuseNicki Minajhas cited Spears as a major influence on her career, and commented, "the fact that she came back out with just so much fire inspires me, and it inspires young women and people all over the world. It just inspires you. A lot of my fans feel like they are the underdog and feel like they are the people who aren't ever accepted for themselves, or who are laughed at or poked fun at forever. It just goes to show that once you keep at whatever it is you're doing, people may not like you, people may not love you, but they will have to respect you at the end of the day. And that respect is all that matters."cite webhttp://www.out.com/entertainment/interviews/2011/05/09/catching-nicki-minajMichelsonNoahSeptember 5, 2011March 6, 2012Catching Up With Nicki Minaj[[Out (magazine)|Out]]Joe LandryLana Del Reyrevealed that she is compelled by Spears in an interview with MTV, saying, "I'm not really interested in a ton of female musicians but there is something about Britney that compelled me the way she sings and just the way she looks."cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1678375/lana-del-rey-britney-spears.jhtmlLana Del Rey 'Compelled' By Britney SpearsKaufmanGilFebruary 2, 2012February 24, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksDel Rey also said that the music video for "Toxic" inspires her.cite webhttp://buzzworthy.mtv.com/2012/01/11/lana-del-rey-mtv-britney-spears-bruce-springsteenphoto/Lana Del Rey Visits MTV, Talks Britney & Bruce, We All Collectively Fall In Love Even Harder (PHOTO)January 11, 2012February 24, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksAnitaiTamarDuring the2011 MTV Video Music Awards,Lady Gagasaid that Spears "taught us all how to be fearless, and the industry wouldn't be the same without her."cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1669862/britney-spears-lady-gaga-kiss-vmas.jhtmlBritney Spears Accepts Video Vanguard VMA – And A Kiss From Lady GagaAugust 28, 2011March 6, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksGaga has also cited Spears as an influence, calling her "the most provocative performer of my time".cite webhttp://www.nowmagazine.co.uk/celebrity-news/300123/lady-gaga-i-don-t-have-time-for-dating/1Lady GaGa: I don't have time for datingFebruary 9, 2009May 22, 2015[[NOW (British magazine)|Now]]Miley Cyruscredits Spears as her biggest inspiration, and has referenced the singer in her hit song "Party in the U.S.A." (2009).cite webVenaJocelynhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1618447/20090810/cyrus__miley.jhtmlMiley Cyrus On Britney Spears: 'I'm Proud Of Her'MTV. MTV NetworksAugust 11, 2009August 14, 2010cite webhttp://top40.about.com/od/singles/gr/mileycyruspartyintheusa.htmMiley Cyrus — Party in the USA — Review of Party in the USA by Miley Cyrus[[About.com]]. [[Rovi Corporation]]June 19, 2010August 14, 2010Spears's personal breakdown was also cited as an inspiration forBarry Manilow's album15 Minutes.cite newshttp://articles.latimes.com/2011/jun/05/entertainment/la-ca-conversation-20110605The Sunday Conversation: Barry ManilowLos Angeles TimesJune 5, 2011August 20, 2011IreneLacherFile:Britney-Spears Boys.jpgthumbrightuprightSpears performing on March 5, 2009Spears has also become a major influence on many other contemporary artists, includingDemi Lovato,cite webhttp://www.younghollywood.com/scene/she-did-it-again-britney-spears-lands-back-on-top.htmlSHE DID IT AGAIN: BRITNEY SPEARS LANDS BACK ON TOPBoyceShannonSeptember 1, 2011January 7, 2012[[Young Hollywood]]Katy Perry,Kelly Key,cite webhttp://www.universomusical.com.br/materia.asp?mtKelly Key busca o sucesso de Christina Aguilera, Jennifer Lopez, Britney Spears, Madonna e Janet JacksonUniverso MusicalJanuary 7, 2012Kristinia DeBarge,cite webhttp://www.rhapsody.com/kristinia-debargeKristinia DeBarge — Rhapsody MusicRhapsody.comAugust 14, 2010Little Boots,cite webhttp://www.rollingstone.com/music/news/artist-to-watch-2009-little-boots-20090807Artist to Watch 2009: Little Boots: Little BootsRolling StoneAugust 14, 2010Charli XCX,cite newsVan NguyenDeanhttp://www.nme.com/news/charli-xcx/79744Charli XCX reveals she would 'love' to write a song with Britney Spears[[NME]]September 12, 2014May 21, 2015Marina and the Diamonds,cite newshttp://news.bbc.co.uk/local/london/hi/people_and_places/music/newsid_8083000/8083745.stmMarina and The Diamonds in the BBC Introducing hotseatJune 9, 2009March 12, 2012[[BBC Music]]CrowleyGaryPixie Lott,cite newsLottPixiehttp://www.guardian.co.uk/music/2009/aug/27/pixie-lott-diaryPixie Lott's diary: 'After the single hit No 1, it went crazy'The GuardianUKAugust 27, 2009August 14, 2010Girls' Generation,Selena Gomez,cite newsGomezSelenahttp://www.mtv.com/news/1706934/selena-gomez-britney-spears-inspiration/Selena Gomez's Evolution Mirrors Britney Spears'MTVUSAMay 7, 2013October 25, 2014Tinashe,Victoria Justicecite webJustinHarphttp://www.digitalspy.com/music/news/a292968/victoria-justice-reveals-musical-influences.html#~pf4uoVYzwhin2uVictoria Justice 'reveals musical influences'December 13, 2010[[Digital Spy]]June 8, 2015andThe Saturdays.cite newshttp://www.thesaturdays.co.uk/girls/mollie/LondonThe Saturdays official websiteMollieKingThe Saturdays influencesMay 2010Fergie (singer)FergieofThe Black Eyed Peasrevealed toThe Hollywood Reporterthat she was happy with Spears's return to the music industry, and continued, "It's amazing. For this many years being in the business, and everything she's been through, it's wonderful to see her make this huge of a comeback. Really, it's a beautiful thing."cite webhttp://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/billboard-music-awards-fergie-expresses-191034Billboard Music Awards: Fergie Expresses Support for Britney SpearsHalperinShirleyMay 22, 2011March 6, 2012[[The Hollywood Reporter]]Lynne SegallSimon Cowellexplained that he is "fascinated by [Britney]. The fact that she's one of the most talked about not just pop stars but people in the world today, means that you've got this star power. [...] She's still hot, she's still having hit records and she's still controversial, there's a reason for that."cite webhttp://www.okmagazine.com/news/simon-cowell-wants-britney-spears-%E2%80%98-x-factor%E2%80%99-%E2%80%9Ci%E2%80%99m-fascinated-her%E2%80%9DSimon Cowell Wants Britney Spears on 'The X Factor': "I'm Fascinated By Her"BlickleyLeighFebruary 28, 2012March 1, 2012[[OK!]][[Northern & Shell]]Jessica JungandHyoyeonof the Korean girl groupGirls' Generationhave also been compared to Spears, due to their blonde hair and the latter's abilities as a dancer.cite webhttp://www.soompi.com/2012/07/02/girls-generations-hyoyeon-is-getting-prettier-by-the-day/soompi.comJuly 3, 2012September 25, 2012Girls' Generation's Hyoyeon Is Getting Prettier by the DayMarina and the Diamonds named Spears as the main influence for her albumElectra Heart, stating that, "I think people thought I was joking about that for a long time. But when I was a teenager there was a genuine connection with this sweet girl who also had this very sexual side that people didn't really want to accept [...] Britney is really smart. And in the way that she inspiredElectra Heart, if you step back from all the cynical stuff, it actually focuses on the idea of innocence being mixed with darkness. For some reason I really like that combination. I suppose because you don't really connect innocence with darkness."cite webMichelsonNoahhttp://www.huffingtonpost.com/2012/08/21/marina-and-the-diamonds-electra-heart_n_1819306.htmlMarina And The Diamonds Chats About 'Electra Heart,' Britney Spears, Lady Gaga And More[[The Huffington Post]]August 21, 2012August 22, 2012Diamandis has also stated that Spears is her main influence when it comes to popular culture and that Spears is one she aspired to being growing up.cite webhttp://www.muumuse.com/2012/04/daily-b-marina-and-the-diamonds-talks-britney-to-q-magazine.html/DAILY B: MARINA AND THE DIAMONDS TALKS BRITNEY TO Q MAGAZINEmuumuse.comSternBradleyApril 27, 2012October 2, 2012

Spears has had a direct influence on singerPorcelain Black's work after growing up around her music as a child. Black describes her music as a "love child between"Marilyn Mansonand Spears, with Spears's work being one of the main inspirations for Black's debut albumMannequin Factory. She also stated that Spears inspired her deep love for choreography.cite webKennedyGerrickPorcelain Black knows she's rock and roll, and doesn't care who says otherwisehttp://latimesblogs.latimes.com/music_blog/2011/04/porcelain-black-knows-shes-rock-n-roll-doesnt-care-who-says-or-thinks-otherwise.htmlPop & Hiss: The L.A. Times music blogSeptember 16, 2011Bebo Normanwrote a song about Spears, called "Britney (Bebo Norman song)Britney", which was released as a single. Boy bandBusted (band)Bustedalso wrote a song about Spears called "Britney (Busted song)Britney", which was on their debut album. South Korean singer,BoAhas also spoken of love and Spears's influence on her. First meeting in 2003 while Spears was promotingIn The ZoneBritney would later provide a writing credit to the song "Look Who's Talking" on BoA'sBoA (album)eponymousdebut English album. Spears's version of the song leaked in 2012.cite webhttp://avex.jp/boa/profile/index.htmlBoA's profile[[Avex|Avex Marketing Inc.]]August 30, 2008jacite webhttp://www.ccmmagazine.com/category/story-behind-the-song/Story Behind The Song: Bebo Norman's "Britney"Ccmmagazine.comAugust 14, 2010People (American magazine)Peoplemagazine and MTV reported that October 1, 2008,the Bronx'sJohn Philip Sousa Middle School, named their music studio in honor of Britney Spears.cite webhttp://newsroom.mtv.com/2008/10/02/britney-spears-gets-bronx-middle-school-music-studio-named-in-her-honor/Britney Spears Gets Bronx Middle School Music Studio Named In Her HonorMTVOctober 2, 2008August 14, 2010Spears herself was present during the ceremony and donated $10,000 to the school's music program.cite webBartolomeoJoeyhttp://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20230241,00.htmlBritney Spears Goes Back to School – for a CausePeopleOctober 1, 2008August 14, 2010In May 2013, new artist Ashley Allen said that although she had been greatly influenced byCeline DionandBarbra Streisand, Britney Spears is her biggest inspiration.cite webhttp://joonbug.com/national/frequency/Britney-Is-Her-Madonna/ujXLQ8Nbi0PBritney Is Her MadonnaJoonbug.comMay 21, 2013May 25, 2013She mentioned that she is obsessed with Britney and that when she attended Britney's concert, she cried.Adelehas also stated multiple times that she is a big fan of Britney. In fact, Adele once cancelled her show by calling in sick just to go to a Britney concert that was on the same day.cite webHowardBeckyhttp://www.vh1.com/celebrity/2009-06-05/adele-skips-out-on-concert-for-britney/Adele Skips Out On Daniel Merriweather Concert For Britney Spears | VH1 CelebrityVH1June 5, 2009June 28, 2013
article.heading: Other ventures
Product and endorsements
article.paragraph: In 2000, the singer released a limited edition of glasses titledShades of Britney.cite webhttp://everything2.com/title/Britney+Brands%252C+Inc.Britney Brands, Inc.June 18, 2012May 14, 2012Everything2 Media, LLCIn 2001, Spears signed a deal with shoe companySkechers,cite webhttp://abcnews.go.com/Entertainment/story?idBritney Spears to Promote PepsiFebruary 7, 2011May 14, 2012[[American Broadcasting Company]]and a $78 million promotional deal withPepsi, their biggest entertainment deal at the time.cite newshttp://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/1157766.stmBritney joins the Pepsi generationFebruary 7, 2001May 14, 2012BBCAside from numerous commercials with the latter during that year, she also appeared in a 2004 Pepsi television commercial in the theme of "Gladiators" with singersBeyonc,Pink (singer)Pink, andEnrique Iglesias.cite newsBritney, Beyoncé, Pink star in Pepsi adhttp://www.usatoday.com/life/music/news/2004-01-27-pepsi-ad_x.htmUSA TodayJanuary 27, 2004http://www.webcitation.org/65A8hRCJZFebruary 3, 2012On June 19, 2002, she released her first multi-platform video game,Britney's Dance Beat, which received positive reviews.cite webhttp://www.gamespot.com/britneys-dance-beat/Britney's Dance BeatGame SpotJune 19, 2002May 14, 2012In March 2009, Spears was announced as the new face of clothing brandCandie's.cite webhttp://articles.nydailynews.com/2009-03-03/entertainment/17918560_1_bright-future-marder-britney-spearsBritney Spears, Candie's Girl?! Jr. brand banks on pop star's future – not her pastMillerKorinMarch 3, 2009May 14, 2012Daily NewsDari Marder, chief marketing officer for the brand, explained why they choose the singer, saying, "everybody loves a comeback and nobody's doing it better than Britney. She's just poised for even greater success."In 2010, Spears designed a limited edition line for the brand, which was released in stores in July 2010.In 2011, she teamed up withSony, Make Up For Ever andPlentyofFishto release her music video for "Hold It Against Me", earning her $500,000 for the product placement.cite newshttp://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/music/2011/02/22/2011-02-22_britney_spears_hold_it_against_me_video_earns_her_500000_katy_perry_slams_produc.htmlBritney Spears 'Hold It Against Me' video earns her $500,000; Katy Perry slams product placementJanuary 22, 2011RobertsSorayaDaily NewsJanuary 28, 2011Spears also teamed up withHasbroin 2012 to release an exclusive version ofTwister (game)Twister Dance, which includes a remix of "Till the World Ends". The singer was also featured on a commercial, which was directed byRay Kay, to promote the game. Spears was also featured on the commercial of "Twister Rave" and the game included a Twister remix of "Circus (song)Circus".cite webhttp://style.mtv.com/2012/04/12/britney-spears-twister-dance/Britney Spears Looks Amazing In $20,000 BraApril 12, 2012April 12, 2012MTV. MTV NetworksCatarinellaAlex

Spears's range of commercial deals and products also includes beauty care products and perfumes. She released her first fragrance withElizabeth Arden,Curious (fragrance)Curiousin 2004, which broke the company's first-week gross for a perfume.By 2009, she had released seven more fragrances including the popular perfume Fantasy,cite bookHinantCindyBritney Spears Fantasy Fantasy Britney Spears2012Cindy HinantNew York2–331which earned her the recognition of the best-selling celebrity fragrance line on the market. The singer's Elizabeth Arden scents make up 34% of celebrity fragrance sales.cite webhttp://www.britneyspears.com/2009/05/britneys-perfume-line-on-top.php//web.archive.org/web/20090525095140/http://www.britneyspears.com/2009/05/britneys-perfume-line-on-top.phpBRITNEY'S PERFUME LINE ON TOPMay 21, 2009May 21, 2009BritneySpears.comIn 2010, Spears released her eighth fragrance,Radiance (fragrance)Radiance. In March 2011, company Brand Sense filed a lawsuit against Spears and Elizabeth Arden seeking $10 million in damages, claiming that the singer and her father, Jamie, stopped paying their thirty-five percent commission that was agreed as part of the contract terms.cite webhttp://www.x17online.com/celebrities/britney_spears/britney_spears_fragrance_perfume_radiance_elizabeth_arden_brand_sense_033011.phpBritney Spears Facing $10 Million Lawsuit In Connection With Fragrance DealMarch 30, 2011August 21, 2011x17 OnlineIn July 2011, a Los Angeles judge denied the request by the company lawyers, claiming the fact that Spears is still under conservatorship.cite webhttp://www.radaronline.com/exclusives/2011/07/britney-spears-doesnt-have-be-deposed-lawsuit-judge-rulesBritney Spears Doesn't Have To Be Deposed In Lawsuit, Judge RulesJuly 11, 2011August 21, 2011[[Radar Online]]Brand Sense, however, stated that they would appeal the decision.In 2011,Radiancewas re-issued in a new fragrance titledCosmic Radiance.cite webhttp://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Britney-Spears/Cosmic-Radiance-12288.htmlCosmic Radiance Britney Spears perfume – a new fragrance for women 2011August 20, 2011FraganticaWorldwide, Spears sold over one million bottles in the first five years, with gross receipts of $1.5 billion.As ofJuly 2014, Spears has released 16 fragrances throughElizabeth Arden.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1684879/britney-spears-x-factor-deal-judge.jhtmlBritney Spears 'X Factor' Deal: By The NumbersMay 10, 2012May 14, 2012KaufmanGilMTV. MTV Networkscite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/news/6176773/britney-spears-fragranceBritney Spears Announces 16th fragranceJuly 23, 2014July 23, 2014Billboard
article.heading: Philanthropy
article.paragraph: The singer founded The Britney Spears Foundation, a charitable entity set up to help children in need. The philosophy behind the Foundation was that music and entertainment has a healing quality that can benefit children.cite webhttp://www.britneyspears.com/foundation-bsf.php//web.archive.org/web/20041102011049/http://www.britneyspears.com/foundation-bsf.phpNovember 2, 2004May 14, 2012BritneySpears.comTHE BRITNEY SPEARS FOUNDATION: HELPING CHILDREN IN NEEDThe Foundation also supported the annual Britney Spears Camp for the Performing Arts, where campers had the opportunity to explore and develop their talents.cite webhttp://www.britneyspears.com/foundation-camp.php//web.archive.org/web/20041025234104/http://www.britneyspears.com/foundation-camp.phpNovember 2, 2004May 14, 2012BritneySpears.comTHE BRITNEY SPEARS CAMP FOR THE PERFORMING ARTSIn April 2002, through the efforts of Spears and The Britney Spears Foundation, a grant of $1 million was made to the Twin Towers Fund to support the children of uniformed service heroes affected by theSeptember 11 attacksterrorist attacksof September 11, 2001, including New York City Fire Department and its Emergency Medical Services Command, the New York City Police Department, the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, the New York State Office of court Administration and other government offices.cite webhttp://www.britneyspears.com/foundation-mission.php//web.archive.org/web/20041018091735/http://britneyspears.com/foundation-mission.phpNovember 2, 2004May 14, 2012BritneySpears.comTHE BRITNEY SPEARS FOUNDATION: MISSION STATEMENTHowever, it was reported in 2008 that the Foundation had a deficit of $200,000.cite webhttp://www.foxnews.com/story/2008/07/22/britney-spears-200g-deficit/Britney Spears' $200G DeficitFriedmanRogerJuly 22, 2008May 14, 2012Fox News ChannelAfter the singer went through conservatorship, her father and lawyer Andrew Wallet zeroed out the effort, leading to its closure in 2011.cite webhttp://www.showbiz411.com/2011/07/21/britney-spears-zeroes-out-her-charitable-foundation-its-overJuly 21, 2011May 14, 2012Britney Spears Zeroes Out Her Charitable Foundation: It's OverFriedmanRogerShowbiz 411

On October 30, 2001, Spears, alongsideBonoand other popular recording artists under the name "Artists Against AIDS Worldwide", released a single titled "What's Going On (song)What's Going On", with the intention to benefit AIDS programs in Africa and other impoverished regions.cite webhttp://www.hopeforafricanchildren.org/New/Press/pr_103001.htmlArtists Against AIDS Worldwide's New Superstar Version of Marvin Gaye's 'What's Going On' in Stores Tuesday, October 30October 29, 2001May 14, 2012Hope for African ChildrenIn the wake ofHurricane Katrinain 2006, Spears donated $350,000 toMusic Rising.cite webhttp://www.looktothestars.org/celebrity/britney-spearsBritney Spears Charity Work, Events and CausesLook to the StarsMay 14, 2012Later in 2011, the singer raised $200,000 during An Evening of Southern Style at a private residence in Beverly Hills to benefit theSt. Bernard Project, with the help of several celebrities, includingHilary Duff,Selena Gomez,Kelly Osbourne,Kellan LutzandKim Kardashian.cite webhttp://www.starpulse.com/news/index.php/2011/05/13/britney_spears_raises_200000_for_hurriBritney Spears Raises $200,000 For Hurricane Katrina CharityMay 13, 2011May 14, 2012StarpulseSpears has also helped several charities during her career, including Madonna's Kabbalah-based Spirituality for Kids,cite webhttp://www.foxnews.com/story/2008/06/19/britney-spears-charity-in-red/Britney Spears' Charity in the RedFriedmanRogerJune 19, 2008May 14, 2012Fox News Channelcancer charity Gilda's Club Worldwide,cite webhttp://news.softpedia.com/news/Britney-Spears-Donates-50-000-To-Cancer-Charity-4759.shtmlBritney Spears Donates $50,000 To Cancer CharityJuly 14, 2005May 14, 2012[[Softpedia]]Promises Foundation, andUnited Way of AmericaUnited Way, with the latter two focused on giving families from various disadvantaged situations new hope and stable foundations for the future.
